item.title: Ssl Disable Connect
item.description: Insert Lead paragraph here. Question 1$ curl https://... 2curl: (35) error:1425F102:SSL routines:ssl_choose_client_version:unsupported protocol 3$ python with_ssl_session.py 4[DEBUG] SSL connection error occurred ('[SSL: WRONG_SSL_VERSION] wrong ssl version (_ssl.c:727)') 5[DEBUG] SSL connection error occurred ('[Errno 0] Error') 6[WARNING] can't establish SSL connection Reason Fixed 1$ vim /etc/ssl/openssl.cnf disable protocol minimum version constraints 1[system_default_sect] 2# MinProtocol = TLSv1.2
